testcase.name: add new pet
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def requestBody = read ('classpath:Karate/createPet/requestBodyCreatePet.json') . passed * def responseBody = read ('classpath:Karate/createPet/responseCreatePet.json') . passed Given path 'pet' .......................................................... passed And request requestBody ................................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responseBody ........................................ passed And assert response.id == requestBody.id .................................. passed And assert response.category.id ==requestBody.category.id ................. passed

testcase.name: add pet with invalid data
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def requestBody = read ('classpath:Karate/createPet/requestBodyCreatePet.json') . passed * def responseBody = read ('classpath:Karate/createPet/responseCreatePet.json') . passed Given path 'pet' .......................................................... passed And request requestBody ................................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responseBody ........................................ passed And assert response.id == requestBody.id .................................. passed And assert response.category.id ==requestBody.category.id ................. passed * url url ................................................................. passed Given path 'pet' .......................................................... passed * def requestBody = read ('classpath:Karate/createPet/requestBodyCreatePetinvalid.json') . passed And request requestBody ................................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 500 ........................................................... passed
